item.title: [gn3] Dragon Hatchling
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Egg
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Egg

Defender

When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

item.title: [gn3] Crucible of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [gn3] Blaze
item.description:
Sorcery

Blaze deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Flametongue Kavu
item.description:
Creature — Kavu

When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [gn3] Flameblast Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.

item.title: [gn3] Dragon Tempest
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

item.title: [gn3] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [gn3] Knollspine Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Knollspine Dragon enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand and draw cards equal to the damage dealt to target opponent this turn.

item.title: [gn3] Kargan Dragonrider
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

item.title: [gn3] Goblin Motivator
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

item.title: [gn3] Furnace Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Shivan Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Seize the Spoils
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [gn3] Rapacious Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [gn3] Mana Geyser
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

item.title: [gn3] Lightning Bolt
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [gn3] Vow of Lightning
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

item.title: [gn3] Elven Ambush
item.description:
Instant

Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

item.title: [gn3] Dwynen's Elite
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

item.title: [gn3] Broken Wings
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

item.title: [gn3] Beast Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

item.title: [gn3] Elvish Skysweeper
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

{4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.

item.title: [gn3] Elvish Rejuvenator
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [gn3] Elvish Archdruid
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.

{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

item.title: [gn3] Joraga Visionary
item.description:
Creature — Elf Wizard

When Joraga Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [gn3] Invigorate
item.description:
Instant

If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.

Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Immaculate Magistrate
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.

item.title: [gn3] End-Raze Forerunners
item.description:
Creature — Boar

Vigilance, trample, haste

When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Elvish Visionary
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [gn3] Rabid Bite
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

item.title: [gn3] Overrun
item.description:
Sorcery

Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Llanowar Tribe
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

item.title: [gn3] Thorn Lieutenant
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

{5}{G}: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Taunting Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf

All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.

item.title: [gn3] Sylvan Messenger
item.description:
Creature — Elf

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [gn3] Regrowth
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [gn3] Ram Through
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

item.title: [gn3] Wirewood Pride
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

item.title: [gn3] Vow of Wildness
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, has trample, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

item.title: [gn3] Thornweald Archer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach, deathtouch

item.title: [gn3] Colossus Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.

Equip {8} ({8}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [gn3] Bloodthirsty Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

{1}: Attach Bloodthirsty Blade to target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [gn3] Argentum Armor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +6/+6.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, destroy target permanent.

Equip {6}

item.title: [gn3] Trusty Machete
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+1.

Equip {2}

item.title: [gn3] Sword of Vengeance
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste.

Equip {3}

item.title: [gn3] Ring of Thune
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's white.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [gn3] Moonsilver Spear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has first strike.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

Equip {4}

item.title: [gn3] Greatsword
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0.

Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
